application.title: AppMarket
application.description: CPhoneに追加できるアプリを販売しています。様々なアプリをここから手に入れよう！アプリの購入はサーバー内通貨で。
application.author: itsu

lang.title: AppMarket
lang.description: AppMarket is an application which sells applications for CPhone.You can buy them with your server currency.
